Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is SWITZERLAND 1. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 04 CH1. VC present in all Swiss alps, several labels in place (organic, 'from alps', national park labels etc.), very traditional, part of Swiss identity.
